txt.en: Goblin sapper-bombs can be found at Drúkala. Goblin-sappers can be found at Drúkala and roaming within Gloomingtarn.\n\nAfter discovering the destructive potential of the Orcs and goblins now encamped in Gloomingtarn, you have resolved to disarm their bombs and defeat their goblin-sappers before any more harm can come to the hallowed cavern.

Goblin sapper-bombs can be found at Drúkala. Goblin-sappers can be found at Drúkala and roaming within Gloomingtarn.\n\nAfter discovering the destructive potential of the Orcs and goblins now encamped in Gloomingtarn, you have resolved to disarm their bombs and defeat their goblin-sappers before any more harm can come to the hallowed cavern.
You have disarmed many sapper-bombs and defeated the goblin-sappers invading Gloomingtarn.

While it is likely that more Orcs and goblins will attempt to settle within Gloomingtarn, you have done the Longbeards and the Gabil'akkâ a great service by driving them off and putting an end to their destructive plans.
Free to pass beyond Zâram-mekhem at long last, the Orcs now seek to ruin the hallowed caverns of Gloomingtarn.
Disarm piles of goblin sapper-bombs\nDefeat goblin-sappers

After passing beyond Zâram-mekhem, the tarn-gate, you have discovered an encampment of Orcs and goblins in Gloomingtarn. Among their filthy provisions, you have spied a number of sapper-bombs. The Orcs of Gundabad must not be allowed to bring ruin to the cradle of Durin the Deathless.\n\nYou should disarm goblin sapper-bombs and defeat goblin-sappers at Drúkala.
